system.requirement: Your young azure dragon is loyal.

abilities.description: Of the Heavens: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} by requesting your dragon to mystically manipulate rain or wood, roll +heart and add +1. On a hit, take +1 momentum.

Remember the Old Ways: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.be95ca063ded2b19]{Compel} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4244b77103f55bc4]{Gather Information} using your dragon's connection to kami or symbolic status in tradition, you may roll +heart (instead of +wits). Add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

Divine @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike}: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} by asking your dragon to attack, roll +heart. If the foe has shown itself to be dishonorable or not a creature of natural origins, add +1. On a hit, your dragon inflicts 3 harm.
